Hi Rusty, What state are you in?  In California I believe our state government code prohibits this.

author: Rusty Rogerson
text: I am new to City Leadership. When I arrived I attended every committee that held a meeting. At one of the meeting a current council member was a voting member of the committee. The committee votes to request funding from the city. Is it appropriate for a council person to vote on a committee decision then vote again at a council meeting?
title: Coucil Person as a voting member
